column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2021
column13: Vine Customer Review of Free Product
column14: I ordered this lip gloss in shade "Pink Bronze" which is a very light pink-nude shade in the picture but in person it barely has any pigment. The applicator is nice and point so you can easily apply it on your lips. I think it mostly looks like a clear lip gloss with a little tinted into it so I wouldn't use it alone but it's nice to be used as a last layer on top of your lipstick so it adds a little shine into it. The quality is nice and it doesn't make my lips sticky and it's very light weight on lips. I think it's a little pricey as there are so many affordable lip glosses that are very similar to this but way more cheaper.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2021
column13: Vine Customer Review of Free Product
column14: Essence of Argan Passion Plum Lipgloss is high quality and looks beautiful on most skin types. This lipgloss is infused with Argan oil and contain natural vitamin E that protects, nourishes and moisturizes lips. It is great for everyday use, day or night. This product is also great for gifting or personal use!

column6: Feels great but confused by the product listing
column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2021
column13: Vine Customer Review of Free Product
column14: I was a little confused by this product listing which said my color was "matte" but it showed up shiny and with sparkles and I really didn't want to try it. That being said, it's not really super glossy or sticky on my lips but just adds a bit of moisture and shine, and just a touch of color. Much better than I had assumed when I saw the tube.

column6: The Pink Bronze is very light
column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2021
column13: Vine Customer Review of Free Product
column14: I got this in Pink Bronze which is a very light, barely there color. It's okay but made my lips look wet, shiny and a bit oily. The description page says: "This long lasting and bright lip gloss makes your lips look wet and sexy."  I felt like my lips looked more greasy.  I like the feel of this, especially when my lips are dry and chapped but I am not a fan of the VERY shiny oily look.

column6: Great color, but I wish it was more moisturizing
column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2021
column13: Vine Customer Review of Free Product
column14: I like this gloss, but I wish it stayed on for a little bit longer, or at least that it was more moisturizing. It doesn’t really have a color which is exactly what I wanted, but it’s very thin and mainly feels like I’m wearing a teensy bit of oil with a ton of very fine glitter on my lips (although it doesn’t look like I’m wearing straight up glitter, so don’t worry about that).

column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2021
column13: Vine Customer Review of Free Product
column14: I really like this lip gloss. It contains argan oil and seems like it moisturizes well. I love the color which is more natural and transparent than some other types of gloss. Feels great on and doesn't leave a sticky feeling. Overall, its great and i would order it again. The only downside is the current retail is around $25 which seems a bit steep for what you get.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2021
column13: Vine Customer Review of Free Product
column14: This gloss seems to be very confused about itself. Is it matte? Is it glossy? Can't tell by the description. Well, in fact, it's a very moisturizing, not much different from standard, slightly pigmented lip gloss. Certainly not worth the double digits it's currently priced at.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2021
column13: Vine Customer Review of Free Product
column14: Essence of Argan Lip Gloss with Moroccan Argan Oil is a very nice product.  When I applied this, my lips were very dry from summer's heat.  It made my lips look fuller and very moist.  It is not cheap, but if you want good quality products,  Essence of Argan is a great choice.
